title: Standards
alt: Fortunately, the charging one has been solved now that we've all standardized on mini-USB. Or is it micro-USB? Shit.
transcript:
How Standards Proliferate
(See: A/C chargers, character encodings, instant messaging, etc.)Situation: 
There are 14 competing standards.Cueball: 14?! Ridiculous! We need to develop one universal standard that covers everyone's use cases.
Ponytail: Yeah!Soon:
Situation: There are 15 competing standards.
